posts.post_title: Who Doesn't Need Another American Beauty?  SOLD
posts.post_content:
Up for grabs is an SGC 20 Ollie Pickering.

Am I crazy?  Don't answer that.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10599/pickering-ab[/IMG]

Guaranteed to be under-graded, over-graded or graded correctly.

Payment net to me anyway you want to, prefer F & F

Let's get it started.
